channel.title: 2 questions
channel.description:
yoooooo guys
im asking somethings about my server and giving + 1 rep to who help me
1st - i just turned on 2 clients of my server then i said Hello an in the other client appeared Illo how i put it normal??
2nd - my server is a spawn server (you spawn stuff) and i want to make exeptions like when u do ::item vesta id it says u cant spawn it kill corp for it?? :S how i do??
3rd - i just wanted to put a costume item just added guthix godsword model but in model folder there are no models only data files i just added the ints to class 8 and it dont works i just spawn dwarf remains what i do??
EDITED - 4th i wanna make another currency called pkcoins and u get 10 pk points each guy u kills how i do it??

item.title: 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Offering reputation points for services is not allowed.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“Dastan_, post:6, topic:361437”]all of your questions are just basic knowledge[/quote]And you need to learn English. I don’t get this part:

[quote=“dzertus, post:3, topic:361437”]i dont wanna do like if i kill corp i can spawn NOOO[/quote]You should say it as: “No, I don’t want it like you kill Corp and then I can spawn.”
